org.lenskit.data.entities

Class EntityCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<Entity>
      • org.lenskit.data.entities.EntityCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<Entity>, Collection<Entity>

    public class EntityCollection
extends AbstractCollection<Entity>
implements Serializable

    A collection of entities of a single type. This collection augments the Collection interface with logic for different kinds of (possibly optimized) entity searches.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Find entities by attribute.

        Parameters:

        value - The attribute value.
        Returns:
